The [[ninneko]] stretches its body and rolls the joint of its neck, launching its fleas at a target. The jutsu's effects after that vary depending on the target's tolerances: [[Kiba Inuzuka]] and [[Akamaru]] fall to the ground in painful itching; [[Shino Aburame]] finds it curious, but otherwise isn't bothered.

[[pt-br:Arte Ninja: Shuriken de Pulgas]]
